question: "Who released the albums ""Sentimental Journey"", ""Goodnight Vienna"", ""Bad Boy"", ""Old Wave"" and ""Vertical Man"" between 1970 and 1999?"
vanilla_rag_result:
The albums "Sentimental Journey" and "Goodnight Vienna" were released by Ringo Starr. "Sentimental Journey" was released in the UK on 27 March 1970 and in the US on 24 April 1970. "Goodnight Vienna" was reissued in the US by Capitol in February 1981.

The albums "Bad Boy", "Old Wave", and "Vertical Man" were also released by Ringo Starr. "Bad Boy" was released in 1978, "Old Wave" in 1983, and "Vertical Man" in 1998.

Therefore, Ringo Starr is the artist who released all five albums between 1970 and 1999.
